item.title: Research Miutes
item.description: Since September I am a member of the Young Academy Groningen. One of the nice perks of being part of such incredible group of people (yes, I still wonder how I got there :P) was the opportunity to take a short course on dealing with the media and to record my “research minutes”, a short, 2 minutes long, video to popularize my work. The video is not yet on youtube, but is already available on Twitter since some time.
